snippet.title: Fearful Symmetry & The Cursed Prince - Announcement Trailer - PEGI
snippet.description:
Steam Page: http://store.steampowered.com/app/725080/

Brain-teasing puzzle game Fearful Symmetry & The Cursed Prince is coming to Xbox One and PC on 12 December 2017! Control two characters at the same time in opposite directions to overcome treacherous levels filled with traps.

Fearful Symmetry & The Cursed Prince is a fun puzzle game with a unique brain-teasing twist. Control two characters at the same time; both in different dimensions. It’s up to you to move the characters simultaneously in opposite directions to guide them through treacherous puzzles filled with traps.

Features

- Control two characters simultaneously and guide them to safety
- Play as three different characters, each with their own story and 
  skills
- Overcome deadly traps while making your way through tons of 
  levels
- Replay levels with different characters for a completely new 
  approach
- Discover hidden secrets on your journey through the dimensions
  Enjoy a timeless pixel art style reminiscent of a classic era of 
  games

Published by SOEDESCO®
Website: http://www.soedesco.com/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Soedesco
Twitter: https://twitter.com/soedesco
Instagram: https://instagram.com/soedesco

Developed by Gamera Interactive
Website: http://www.gameragames.net/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/gameragames/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/gameragamesint
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCI-6N2UiFMVeIGx8dFsuMNQ
